column1:
COUNSEL 
R.  Arasacularatne P.C. with Chamindri
Dsppula de Livera P.C., ASG  for the respondent.

Counsel  for  the  accused-appellant 
informs  Court that  they
are only contesting the conviction and not the sentence.  Counsel for  the

appellant  moves  that  the 
sentence  be  suspended. 
Learned  Additional

Solicitor General  Mr.  Dappula de  Livera  P.C. 
who  is  appearing for  the
respondent informs Court that he has no objection to  this application as

long  as  the  suspended 
sentence  is  for  a 
long  period.  Judgment  dated
02.03.2012 is affirmed.  Conviction is also affirmed.  Sentence imposed for
two  years  is  suspended  to  10  years.  The  fine  imposed  will  remain  as  it
is.  The compensation ordered with the default term will  also remain as it
